full_threads.body:
Thanks Joel!

That's all good now for the Transport and I've reset our password and we're able to get in. Thanks!

Kind Regards,

Rebecca Licciardello

Business Support Officer



T 1300 67 81 80 W argylehire.com.au

PRIVATE AND CONFIDENTIAL | The information contained in this email and any attachments is confidential to the addressee. If you are not the intended recipient, you must not peruse, use, disseminate, distribute or copy this email or attachments. If you have received this in error, please notify us by return email. The Company does not guarantee the security or reliability of this email or any attachments.

Hi Rebecca,

All good on our end :)

Just confirming that we’ve updated the form:
https://argylehire.com.au/for-hire/access/transport/transport/

Regarding the account, admin@argylehire.com has now been set as an administrator. This means you’ll be able to reset the password moving forward. A password reset email has also been sent to admin@argylehire.com.

Let us know if you need anything else!

Hi Joel,

Sorry can the time be like we have when you book a machine with the drop down? Like so:



Our account was registered to admin@argylehire.com.au (however our correct email address is admin@argylehire.com). When we try to reset the password it must send to the incorrect email.

Kind Regards,

Rebecca Licciardello

Business Support Officer



T 1300 67 81 80 W argylehire.com.au

PRIVATE AND CONFIDENTIAL | The information contained in this email and any attachments is confidential to the addressee. If you are not the intended recipient, you must not peruse, use, disseminate, distribute or copy this email or attachments. If you have received this in error, please notify us by return email. The Company does not guarantee the security or reliability of this email or any attachments.

Hi Rebecca,

All good on the field AM/PM and the centered form (It was cached).

Regarding the password reset, can you confirm what email you guys are using?

Hi Joel,

Sorry, but can we do the time the same as when someone books a machine with a drop down bar with only hourly intervals and with AM and PM?

When I'm logged in the form is centred on the screen, but when I view it logged out it is on the left side of the screen. Can we make it centred all the time?

Additionally, I think someone has reset the password to our account and we can't log in. We also cannot reset the password because the email it is registered to is actually incorrect.

Kind Regards,

Rebecca Licciardello

Business Support Officer



T 1300 67 81 80 W argylehire.com.au

Hi Rebecca,

We have made updates to the form and categories, Can you please try now?
https://argylehire.com.au/for-hire-access/scissor-lifts-electric/

Hi Joel,

The drop off time still appears to be in date format instead of time, and the transport is still in the electric scissor lifts category.

The other things seem correct now, though.

Kind Regards,

Rebecca Licciardello

Business Support Officer



T 1300 67 81 80 W argylehire.com.au

PRIVATE AND CONFIDENTIAL | The information contained in this email and any attachments is confidential to the addressee. (Time: 45mins)

Hi Rebecca,

Just confirming that all the requested updates have now been completed:
  • Google address autocomplete is active for both the Pick Up and Delivery Address fields.
  • The ‘Date Float to be Completed’ field is now using the DD/MM/YYYY format.
  • The ‘Drop Off Time’ field has been corrected to accept time inputs rather than dates.
  • The Electric Scissor Lifts category has also been reviewed and updated accordingly.

Please feel free to test everything at your convenience, and let us know if there's anything else we can help with.

https://argylehire.com.au/for-hire-access/scissor-lifts-electric/
https://argylehire.com.au/for-hire/access/scissor-lifts-electric/transport/

Hi Joel,

It doesn't look like the pick up and delivery address have auto-fill working, is that something that's able to be done?

Can we also change the 'Date Float to be Completed' to DD/MM/YYYY (instead of MM/DD/YYYY), and the 'Drop Off Time' is currently as dates instead of times, can that be changed too, please?

It looks like it's still there in the electric scissor lifts category.

Kind Regards,

Rebecca Licciardello

Business Support Officer



T 1300 67 81 80 W argylehire.com.au

Hi Rebecca,

Confirming we have updated the pages.
https://argylehire.com.au/for-hire-access/
https://argylehire.com.au/for-hire-access/scissor-lifts-electric/

https://argylehire.com.au/for-hire/access/scissor-lifts-electric/transport/

Hi Joel,

Could we actually remove the image and everything on the left side, and just make the whole page as the form, please? And can we make the two address fields like an autofill like when the customer checks out (if possible)?



Could we also remove the transport product from the Electric Scissor Lifts category?



Thank you!

Kind Regards,

Rebecca Licciardello

Business Support Officer



T 1300 67 81 80 W argylehire.com.au

(Time: 60mins)

Hi Rebecca,

I hope all is well.

We have updated the product and the menu.

https://argylehire.com.au/for-hire/access/scissor-lifts-electric/transport/

Hi Rebecca,

All good :)

We will work on these changes and update you once it is done.

Thanks Joel! Sorry to be a pain, but are we also able to make some changes on the website in regards to our floats category? In the top drop down bar under equipment hire, can we please delete "Floats" from under "Trailers and Floats", and then rename "Trailers and Floats" to just "Trailers"? And then can we please make the following changes on this product for our transport?
  • Change the product name from "Transport Sydney Metro" to "Tilt Tray Transport"
Are we able to make it more like a contact us form, where they just fill out questions and there are no prices? We would want the following questions:
  • Email Address
  • First Name
  • Last Name
  • Phone Number
  • Company Name (optional)
Then these questions under a "Job Details" title:
  • Number of Machines to be Floated
  • Machine/s Description (e.g. model number)
  • Machine/s Weight (rough weight, in total if more than one machine to be floated)
  • Pick Up Address
  • Drop Off Address
  • Date Float to be Completed
  • Drop Off Time
So we would want all questions compulsory, except the company name. We would want this to be like a contact us form, so they don't have to go to check out for us to receive this form. We would also want the customer to receive a copy of the form they have submitted, if possible? Please let me know if you need me to describe anything further😊 Kind Regards, Rebecca Licciardello Business Support Officer T 1300 67 81 80 W argylehire.com.au PRIVATE AND CONFIDENTIAL | The information contained in this email and any attachments is confidential to the addressee. If you are not the intended recipient, you must not peruse, use, disseminate, distribute or copy this email or attachments. If you have received this in error, please notify us by return email. The Company does not guarantee the security or reliability of this email or any attachments.

Hi Rebecca,

Confirming the products has been publish.

300mm Rock Combo Auger
600mm Rock Combo Auger
1.8t Round Auger Drive

Hi Joel,

Looks good! Thank you for that.

We are happy to publish😊

Kind Regards,

Rebecca Licciardello

Business Support Officer

I hope you're well!

We've updated the delivery fees — please see the screenshot attached for your reference.

300mm Rock Combo Auger
